message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it's incredibly valuable and will be a great asset to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can reach a better agreement. I am willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the product's value. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still concerned about the price, given my valuation of the product. I would like to propose $10,000 as a potential price for the product.
